recipes.title: Crispy Roasted Brussels Sprouts
recipes.description: Perfectly crispy on the outside, tender on the inside. The secret is high heat and patience.

recipes.title: Banana Banana Bread
recipes.description: The most delicious, moist loaf with loads of banana flavor. This classic banana bread recipe creates a tender, perfectly sweet treat that's wonderful toasted.

recipes.title: Brown Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Crispy edges, chewy centers, and complex nutty flavor from brown butter. Worth the extra step.

recipes.title: Daiquiri No. 1
recipes.description: The most elegant, simple, and famous of all Cuban cocktails. The Daiquiri and its variants were set in stone by legendary barman Constantino Ribalaigua of the famous Florida bar in Havana.

recipes.title: Classic Margarita
recipes.description: The definitive margarita. Fresh lime juice, quality tequila, properly balanced. No mix needed.

recipes.title: Paper Plane
recipes.description: A perfectly balanced modern classic—equal parts everything, impossibly good.

recipes.title: Mai Tai
recipes.description: The original Mai Tai created by Victor Bergeron in 1944. Not overly sweet, the Mai Tai is a beautifully balanced drink that showcases aged rum with lime, orgeat, and orange curaçao.

recipes.title: Saturn
recipes.description: A winning combination of gin, lemon, passion fruit, falernum, and orgeat. Created for the 1967 World Championship, this drink represents the rings of Saturn.

recipes.title: Negroni
recipes.description: The iconic Italian aperitif. Bold, bitter, beautiful. Equal parts gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth.

recipes.title: Jungle Bird
recipes.description: A drink from the post-tiki era that has found great popularity coast to coast in cocktails of all stripes. Adapted by Smuggler's Cove.

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: Rich, creamy tomato curry with spiced yogurt-marinated chicken. Restaurant quality at home.

recipes.title: Neo-Neapolitan Pizza Dough
recipes.description: This is the dough for making New Haven-style pizzas and pizzas in the style of Lombardi's, Totonno's, John's, Grimaldi's, and Tacconelli's. It makes a thin, crisp crust with airy pockets in the crown. This dough stays crisp better than Napoletana dough, which softens under the toppings.

recipes.title: Instant Pot Guinness Beef Stew
recipes.description: All the flavor of a slow-cooked stew done in a fraction of the time in the pressure cooker. Made with beef stew meat, onion, celery, carrots, parsnips, and of course, Guinness.

recipes.title: Pasta Carbonara
recipes.description: A rich, creamy Roman classic made the authentic way—no cream needed.

recipes.title: Classic French Toast
recipes.description: Perfectly golden, custardy French toast with a hint of vanilla and cinnamon.
